channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
I have done everything correctly, (I am using a 525 Cache) I have put in my ip to the current one (TitanScape) I have compiled, opened the client, tried to log in
It says error connecting
Another thing i used I used that "Your Server" thing in the downloads section I did everything correctly I filled in my ip I finished and then it said "Your server is offline" Yet, i have "Run Server" open
I have the environmental variables set up I think I have done the portforwarding correctly (I am using a SKY Broadband)
Any help would be greatly appreciated

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @fizzyscape fizzyscape
item.description:
@fizzyscape wrote:

I have done everything correctly, (I am using a 525 Cache)
I have put in my ip to the current one (TitanScape)
I have compiled, opened the client, tried to log in

It says error connecting

Another thing i used
I used that “Your Server” thing in the downloads section
I did everything correctly
I filled in my ip
I finished and then it said “Your server is offline”
Yet, i have “Run Server” open

I have the environmental variables set up
I think I have done the portforwarding correctly (I am using a SKY Broadband)

Any help would be greatly appreciated

Read full topic
